document_data.name: Elderflower Wine
document_data.mainbody: '''Elderflower wine''' was a light alcoholic drink fermented using tender and fragrant [[elderflower]]s of the elder tree.
document_data.Description: Elderflower wine was light in both color and alcoholic content, and perfectly refreshing when served chilled.
document_data.Availability:
In the hamlet of [[Liam's Hold]], along the [[Trade Way]], elderflower wine and [[sugar]] were used to poach red and black [[cherries]] for the delectable [[cherry pie]] from [[Nell's Pie Shop]].

Beyond [[Toril]], elderflower wine was a customary drink presented to first-time visitors of the [[Beastlands (plane)|Beastlands]], also known as the Happy Hunting Grounds plane.
